message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $925000 for the product. This is my final offer for now.
I understand you're trying to get closer to your original price, but I'm still not comfortable with that. I'm willing to meet you at $875000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.

I understand you're trying to be reasonable, but I need to get closer to my original price. I'm willing to meet you at $900000, but I need to get at least that for the product. This is my final offer for now.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still not comfortable with $900000. I'm willing to meet you at $880000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
